author: shayne ๏̯͡๏
text: it’s so beautiful that one day i’ll be sickeningly in love and adore someone once again. just to be wrapped in someone’s arms and shower them with all the love in my heart, just makes me melt. i love love

author: shayne ๏̯͡๏
text: it feels so sad to watch someone fall out of love with you

author: shayne ๏̯͡๏
text: just want to curl up in a ball and be held
